subject: Specsy unit testing framework now runs on JUnit 5
msgSnippet: Hi, I ve recently released a JUnit 5 test engine for the Specsy unit testing framework (http://specsy.org/). This should be of interest to the JUnit 5 team and
messageBody:
Hi,

I've recently released a JUnit 5 test engine for the Specsy unit testing framework (http://specsy.org/).

This should be of interest to the JUnit 5 team and IDE integration developers, because Specsy produces quite different events from JUnit; there are nested tests and the enclosing tests are typically executed multiple times. Run the sample test on Specsy's front page for an example.

--
Esko Luontola
www.orfjackal.net
